K10sjdh_u:3: ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma,
K10sjdh_u:4: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhir bhikṣuśatair evaṃ pramukhaiś
K10sjdh_u:6: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃś catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcanādisaṃskṛtas
K10sjdh_u:9: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritāyan prabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātun mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt //
K10sjdh_u:11: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā
K10sjdh_u:12: sahasā sthāyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
K10sjdh_u:13: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat /
K10sjdh_u:14: paramāścaryābhūt tatprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ?
K10sjdh_u:19: ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānāguṇaratnavibhūṣitā nānāratnakūṭāgārādivṛkṣapuṣpakariṇyupaśobhitā
K10sjdh_u:20: yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ padmottaratathāgataḥ sakāśad dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
K10sjdh_u:21: tatra lokadhātau indro nāma mahābodhivṛkṣaratnamayāny asti /
K10sjdh_u:24: tatra padmāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti /
K10sjdh_u:25: te sarvalokadhātubhyaḥ āgatā bodhisattvās tāṃ pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ /
K10sjdh_u:27: atha padmottaratathāgatas teṣāṃ āśayānuśayaṃ jñātvā bahujanahitāya sukhāya lokānukampāya
K10sjdh_u:28: devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca hitāya mahāyānasya paripūraṇārtham avaivartikadharmacakraṃ pravartitavān /
K10sjdh_u:30: bhagavan kiyac ciraṃ sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaras tathāgatas tiṣṭhati saddharmaṃ vā /
K10sjdh_u:34: ye yatra jātā bodhisattvās teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuṣpramāṇaṃ /
K10sjdh_u:35: pūrvañ ca kulaputra sā lokadhātuś candanā nāma babhūva /
K10sjdh_u:36: na tv evaṃ pariśuddhā nākīrṇaśuddhasattvā yathaitarhi sā lokadhātuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:37: kulaputra candanāyāṃ lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvat sa cāpi viṃśatyantarakalpān dharmaṃ deśayitavān /
K10sjdh_u:38: tasya parinirvāṇakālasamaye cāpy ekatyā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyadbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāntāḥ /
K10sjdh_u:40: adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamas tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
K10sjdh_u:43: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ /
K10sjdh_u:44: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati;
K10sjdh_u:46: tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
K10sjdh_u:48: tatkāle ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamas tathāgatas tenopajagmuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:49: upetya te sarve nānāprakārair bodhisattvavikurvaiś candrottamasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam etad avocan /
K10sjdh_u:50: icchāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavann ime daśāntarakalpā nirodham avahitena cittenātināmayituṃ /
K10sjdh_u:51: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamas tathāgato gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam āmantryaitad avocat /
K10sjdh_u:52: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvātītānāgatais tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśitaṃ /
K10sjdh_u:53: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhantas te 'pi deśayanti /
K10sjdh_u:54: ye bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktabodhisattvānāṃ deśayiṣyanti / tadyathā;
K10sjdh_u:56: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke saṃmade mahāsaṃmade,
K10sjdh_u:57: devām aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke,
K10sjdh_u:58: jaya durjaye jaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi,
K10sjdh_u:66: ārakṣa dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadam idaṃ / SjDh_1
K10sjdh_u:75: gupte śubhaprabhe tatphale agraphale niṣphale nilaha amukta amukta nirmukte,
K10sjdh_u:130: some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale [Page 12] prasare,
K10sjdh_u:133: drāme nijaso grakkrame nayane indriyāṇāṃ balānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_7
K10sjdh_u:142: nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte succhendena saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_8
K10sjdh_u:153: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare pravare,
K10sjdh_u:174: bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare,
K10sjdh_u:197: samanantarārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatāsmiṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpitā;
K10sjdh_u:198: tathāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ samapāṇītalajātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante /
K10sjdh_u:199: ye 'pi teṣv avasthitāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā bodhisattvās tathāgatabalena
K10sjdh_u:200: svakasvakeṣu [Page 14] buddhakṣetreṣv antarhitā imāṃ sahālokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe
K10sjdh_u:201: bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntās tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakāraiḥ pūjāṃ
K10sjdh_u:203: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāś ca devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍamanuṣyakumbhāṇḍapiśācādayas sannipatitās te tatra padmābuddhakṣetraṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ tathāgataṃ ca paśyanti /
K10sjdh_u:205: bodhisattvair iyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātusthāṃ buddhān bhagavataś
K10sjdh_u:207: te āścaryaprāptā buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā samādhibalena tasthuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:209: imāṃ kulaputra dhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo bhāvayamānaś caturaśītidhāraṇīśatasahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiś ca ṣaṣṭiñ ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate mahāmaitrīkaruṇādayaḥ /
K10sjdh_u:210: ye ca māṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti te 'vaivartino bhaviṣyanti /
K10sjdh_u:211: ye likhiṣyanti te buddhadarśanena saddharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti /
K10sjdh_u:213: [Page 15] ye svādhyāyanti teṣāṃ sarvāṇy akarmāni parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
K10sjdh_u:214: ye bhāvayanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇy akarmāni naśyuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:217: ye parebhyaś ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatā bhavanti //
K10sjdh_u:218: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat /
K10sjdh_u:219: yaiḥ khalu kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ /
K10sjdh_u:220: mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād imān dhāraṇīṃ prāptā,
K10sjdh_u:222: etarhy api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā /
K10sjdh_u:223: evaṃ khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudrabodhisattvena candrottamatathāgatasya sakāśād imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ prāptā dhāritā vācitā,
K10sjdh_u:224: 'syā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudro bodhisattvaḥ candrottamatathāgatasya parinirvāṇād
K10sjdh_u:225: yasyāṃ rātrau prathame yāme saddharmāntarhite tasyāṃ paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhiṃ
K10sjdh_u:226: prāptā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgato [Page 16] bhavati /
K10sjdh_u:227: tathā kulaputra mama sakāśād iyaṃ drāviḍamantrapadā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśaya /
K10sjdh_u:228: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreyāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
K10sjdh_u:229: tena te maitreyaitarhi mamāntikād yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
K10sjdh_u:230: yathātītānāṃ tathāgatānām antikād atītair bodhisattvair yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītāḥ //
K10sjdh_u:231: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadam avalokya tasyāṃ velāyām imāni mantrapadāny abhāṣata / tadyathā:
K10sjdh_u:232: dāntabhūmiḥ damathabhūmiḥ smṛtibhūmiḥ prajñābhūmir vaiśāradyabhūmiḥ pratisaṃvidbhūmir anutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmir jātikṣayabhūmir muja vinmujaḥ,
K10sjdh_u:238: vimati vimati yopahira regamata vasisakrama iticoravate,
K10sjdh_u:239: makhe mudra daharavate prajñākṣā bubu dahakramitā sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati,
K10sjdh_u:243: iṭe iṭabale [Page 17] atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ,
K10sjdh_u:244: latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi,
K10sjdh_u:248: api devānāṃ bhagavāṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktāny adhimuktipadāni prakāśayati,
K10sjdh_u:249: eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhir devanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam abhūt / SjDh_11
K10sjdh_u:258: ebhir adhimuktipadair daśānāṃ devakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ sthitāḥ / SjDh_12
K10sjdh_u:265: ebhir adhimuktipadaiś catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni,
K10sjdh_u:281: ebhir adhimuktipadair dvādaśānāṃ yakṣakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ / SjDh_14
K10sjdh_u:311: vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati [Page 19] gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ,
K10sjdh_u:313: ebhir adhimuktipadair ṣaṭpañcāśānām asurasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni avaivartikāś ca vyavasthitāḥ / SjDh_15
K10sjdh_u:317: sattvānāṃ hitāya bodhisattvaguṇaniṣpādanārthaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
K10sjdh_u:318: caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ,
K10sjdh_u:329: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāñ caratā,
K10sjdh_u:336: mukhāc ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya tasmāj jihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo
K10sjdh_u:337: pramuktās taiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena nirayatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ sphuṭā babhūvuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:338: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti,
K10sjdh_u:339: yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
K10sjdh_u:340: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhir lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiś ca,
K10sjdh_u:341: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitaśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto,
K10sjdh_u:347: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya,
K10sjdh_u:349: tatas te nairayikās sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti,
K10sjdh_u:350: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
K10sjdh_u:351: atha te sattvās tena cittaprasādakuśalamūlena tataś cyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā ekatyā manuṣyeṣu,
K10sjdh_u:353: ye śītanārakāṃ sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā vā sukhasamarpitā devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā evaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayas saṃcodanti /
K10sjdh_u:354: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyānasūtradharmaśravaṇāya
K10sjdh_u:355: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayām āsuḥ /
K10sjdh_u:357: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
